The first of three components of this course includes the "complete business professional" where students will learn how to present themselves as business professionals. As part of this component, students will learn about organizational hierarchies, culture and politics. The writing component of the course will address how to use business writing tools properly. Students will learn that concise writing is the standard form of writing for business. The oral communication component will give students practise speaking in a professional style with attention to mode and style of delivery, in addition to content.
